publicationStmt.publisher: Yoav Cohen and Maya Ben Tov, Ben-Gurion University

lg.l: My legs take me to all manner of places
My hands rape me at night beneath the all-knowing stars
They seduce my emotions by caressing the heartstrings of my guitar
Don't ask for an interpretation to this dream
Don't ask me to explain myself again
My heart is an instrument for gauging what you feel
My mind's a justice of peace that discerns what is bullshit and what is real
My mouth only speaks what is true for him and her, for you and me
My eyes see beyond the future that your god has decreed
Don't ask for an interpretation to this dream
Don't ask me to explain myself again
